data.eml:eml: Eleven new species of the genus Cluzobra Edwards (Diptera, Mycetophilidae, Sciophilinae) from the Atlantic Forest of Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Amorim, Dalton De Souza, Oliveira, Sarah Siqueira (2008): Eleven new species of the genus Cluzobra Edwards (Diptera, Mycetophilidae, Sciophilinae) from the Atlantic Forest of Brazil. Zootaxa 1920: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184695
